body.p:
Milton Trimble Co. Ky
April 11th 1861
To His Excellency
B. Magoffin Gov. of Kentucky

Wheras owing to my advanced age and ill health I am unable to attend to the duties imposed upon me as Col. of the Enrolled Militia of Trimble Co. I beg leave to offer my resignation. Hoping that thereby the office will be placed in better hands I am respectfully

John M. Abbott
Trimble Co
Resignation of Col of Enrolled Militia
Filed Ap 16 1861
